page.title: 16RECREATION IN ERITH 1985
page.content: Much of today's leisure time for both adults and children is spent in watching television. With video machines and video films increasing in popularity, many families are inclined to stay at home rather than go out! It can be more economic for a family to hire a video film than to go to the cinema. In recent years there has been a great interest in keeping fit and healthy. "We", the public are encouraged to exercise and are advised to eat the 'right' things. The media tell us what is good for or harmful to us. Local churches provide spiritual and social activities for their parishoners. Many children have their own home computers, and electronic toys are popular.
